name: Zogix
tag_list: sustainability, software-as-a-service, web-service, green, application, Points
overview:
Zogix is a provider of sustainability solutions that enable companies to measure, track and reduce carbon emissions. Through a portfolio of software applications, Zogix enables companies to reduce their operating costs and increase product and service revenues by deploying “Green” solutions.

Zogix is currently launching 2 products:

  • “Employee Services” - a corporate Travel and Entertainment tool that reduces operating costs by improving policy compliance and deploys “sustainable travel policies” to track and reduce carbon emissions from business travel.

    • “Z Points” - an end user reward program for the travel industry that rewards individuals for sustainable choices. Z points are made available through “Travel Aggregators”, “Green certified travel service providers” and “Eco brands”.

Zogix received the prestigious EMEA Oracle Partner Award in 2007 (2nd) and was voted as the company with the “Most Innovative Use of Oracle Technology” at the 2008 Oracle UK Partner Awards.

Zogix is based in London (UK) and San Mateo (US, California).
